industry: Non-profit Organizations and Primary and Secondary Education
description:
Looking for a new and exciting opportunity as a Sales Manager? Join our clients team and showcase your impressive sales skills.

Your ability to develop and maintain strong client relationships using a consultative approach will be crucial.

We are seeking a charismatic and engaging individual who can effectively demonstrate the value of services to decision-makers. By understanding client needs and tailoring solutions accordingly, you will ensure customer satisfaction and drive repeat business.

If you are self-motivated, results-oriented, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, this role is perfect for you.

Responsibilites:

  • Take charge of the team and achieve both project goals and revenue growth goals
  • Develop and implement strategies, tactics, and action plans to achieve financial goals
  • Ensure customer satisfaction
  • Promote continuous improvement
  • Foster a positive work environment
  • Create effective customer acquisition strategies
  • Engage in effective communication with clients and stakeholders
  • Offer support and leadership
  • Willingness to travel for work, both domestically and internationally


Location: Chicago,IL

Requirements

  • Extensive experience in sales, preferably in a fast-paced and competitive market
  • Proven track record of exceeding sales targets and driving revenue growth
  • Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients
  • Negotiation and presentation skills are required
  • Demonstrated ability to analyze customer needs and offer tailored solutions that address their specific challenges and objectives
  • Charismatic and dynamic personality, with the ability to captivate and engage potential customers
  • Provide coaching and training to team members
  • Assess team performance and implement enhancements
  • A bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or a related field is preferred


Benefits

  • Salary: $100 000 - $150 000 base + Bonus
  • Discretionary bonus
  • 401k
  • Health Insurance
  • Permanent Position
  • Paid Time Off
